    • Models中Country的使用

      返回变量类型为Country的类型的Models中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明

      参数类型为Country的Models中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void Continent.addCountry​(Country cont)
      Add country to continent
      void Country.addNeighbour​(Country country)
      Add neighbour relationship
      boolean Player.attackPhase​(Country from, Country to)
      Attack phase
      boolean Player.attackPhase​(Country from, Country to, int attackDice, int defendDice)
      Attack phase
      boolean Phases.attackValidation​(Country sourceCountry, Country targetCountry, int attackDice, int defendDice)
      For checking validation in attack phase
      boolean Phases.deploymentAfterConquer​(Country from, Country to, int num)
      deployment After Conquer
      boolean Player.findPath​(Country sourceCountry, Country targetCountry)
      This function is used during the fortification phase to decide whether a player can move army from one country to another;
      void Player.fortificate​(Country from, Country to, int num)
      Transfers army from one country to another during the fortification phase
      void Player.fortificationsPhase​(Country from, Country to, int num)
      Sends army from one country to another
      void Player.reinforcementPhase​(Country chosen)
      Sends 1 army from current player to chosen Country during reinforcement phase
      void Phases.startUpPhase​(Country chosen)
      Sends 1 army from current player to chosen Country during start up phase
